text: @thehill Seeing someone on television every day is proof they are involved and doing things right...okay. Well, considering @realDonaldTrump hates @CNN @MSNBC @maddow @NPR and all the rest of the media...he better get used to them. They are on TV EVERY DAY! #coronavirus #ThursdayThoughts
